/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars are parked neatly along the sides of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the distance, the majestic Great Wall of China can be seen, its imposing structure a stark contrast to the modern cityscape.
